SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.lb10
Package it.polimi.ingsw.lb10.server.controller

Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lb10.server.controller.LobbyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LobbyRequestVisitor
public class LobbyController extends Object implements LobbyRequestVisitor
This SINGLETON class handles the login requests and dispatches players inside match controllers, keeps track of starting or waiting match and signed in players separated from Server. Every class method has to be SYNCHRONIZED.

    • addRemoteView

      public static void addRemoteView(RemoteView remoteView)
      Parameters:

      public boolean validateUsername(@NotNull @NotNull String username)
      Parameters:
      username - the username to be validated
      Returns:
      true if there's no other player in the signedPlayers list with the same username

      Parameters:
      hashCode - the new player's hash code
      username - the new player's username this method adds e new player to the LobbyController's list after login.

    • visit

      public void visit(@NotNull @NotNull LoginRequest lr)
      this method handles the login request sent by the client, checking if the requested username is valid
      Specified by:
      visit in interface LobbyRequestVisitor
      Parameters:
      lr - login request sent by the client

    • visit

      public void visit(@NotNull @NotNull LobbyToMatchRequest ltmr)
      this method handles the request of a client which wants to join a specific match. First thing to do is check if the match is present in the waiting list then the client remote view is submitted to the match controller and a new JoinMatchRequest is propagated to the specific match controller which will handle it.
      Specified by:
      visit in interface LobbyRequestVisitor
      Parameters:
      ltmr - lobby to match request sent by the client

    • visit

      public void visit(@NotNull @NotNull MatchRequest mr)
      Specified by:
      visit in interface LobbyRequestVisitor
      Parameters:
      mr - the match request received by the client controller This is a key method to handle MatchRequest objects sent by the client, LobbyController just finds out which MatchController the request refers to and submits it to his BlockingQueue.

    • visit

      public void visit(@NotNull @NotNull NewMatchRequest newMatchRequest)
      Specified by:
      visit in interface LobbyRequestVisitor
      Parameters:
      newMatchRequest - request sent by the client when a new match must be created, contains number of players required to start the match.

    • visit

      public void visit(@NotNull @NotNull QuitRequest quitRequest)
      Specified by:
      visit in interface LobbyRequestVisitor
      Parameters:
      quitRequest - sent by the client whenever he wants to leave the match Lobby controller will disconnect the client once this request is received.

    • visit

      public void visit(PingRequest pingRequest)
      Specified by:
      visit in interface LobbyRequestVisitor
      Parameters:
      pingRequest - the ping request sent by the client. LobbyController will send a pong response.

    • visit

      public void visit(PongRequest pongRequest)
      Specified by:
      visit in interface LobbyRequestVisitor
      Parameters:
      pongRequest - the pong request sent by the client. every pong request sets server heart beat counter to zero as the client is still connected.

    • submitToController

      public void submitToController(@NotNull @NotNull MatchController controller, @NotNull @NotNull MatchRequest request, int userHash) throws InterruptedException
      Parameters:
      controller - the match controller assigned to the client's match.
      request - the request to be submitted to the match controller.
      userHash - the hash code of the player who submitted the request.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - in case match controller has been interrupted.

    • removeMatch

      public static void removeMatch(int matchId)
      this method removes the match with the given match id from matches list.
      Parameters:
      matchId - the id of the match to be terminated.

    • disconnectClient

      public static void disconnectClient(int userHash)
      this method disconnects the client from game LobbyController. Client is removed from his match if he is actually playing, is removed from signedPlayers if he belongs to the list, this double check is done because of multiple threads can disconnect a single client in case of connection error. Remote view is closed and removed from remoteViews list and heartBeat gets shut down.
      Parameters:
      userHash - hash code of the player.

    • send

      public static void send(int hashcode, Response response)
      Parameters:
      hashcode - receiver client's hash code.
      response - the response to be sent.
